title: SVBP Hospital Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 04 Junior/ Senior Resident Posts
description: The Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel Hospital Delhi (SVBP Hospital Delhi) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Junior Resident and Senior Resident Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ MBBS, Post-graduation, Diploma, and DNB can apply for the SVBP Hospital Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview.
